divs: sighting details1\2 moon over staten island, looking toward staten island north west from st. george to bayonne new jersey 12 degrees elevation heading north from staten island toward hudson river, slight curve up and down, streek of white light, visable con trail then disappated after a few seconds slight hissing noise. observed while standing on dock near the roll-up door (hypo station, 6700 shore road brooklyn new york. clear night. time was 1:17 am
Summary: Light white streek (slight con trail) with slight hissing noise.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around June 12th 2008
